title.rendered: realme narzo 50A (Oxygen Blue, 4GB RAM + 128GB Storage) – with No Cost EMI/Additional Exchange Offers

excerpt.rendered:
• MediaTek Helio G85 Octa-core Processor
  • 4 GB RAM | 128 GB ROM | Expandable Upto 256 GB
  • 16.51 cm (6.5 inch) HD+ Display
  • 50MP+2MP+2MP Primary Camera | 8MP Front Camera
  • 6000 mAh Battery
